result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel W Raether was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay fine, costs and DNA surcharge within 60 days (4/10/15) or request a payment plan through the Dodge County Clerk of Courts office within said time.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel W Raether

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

15CT42, 15CT38, 15CM30, 14CM588: Defendant, Morgan L. Saxe in court w/o counsel, Def. Marshawn Hunt in court w/o counsel, Def. Daniel Raether in court w/o counsel; Def. Steven Panek in court w/o counsel; James T. Sempf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews right to counsel with all; all Defs. waive right to counsel; Court reviews charges/penalties for each (OAR in 15CT42 & 15CT38, CDTP in 15CM30 and Operate Firearm while intox. in 14CM588); Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; Def. Saxe pleads NC to OAR; Def. Hunt pleads NC to OAR; Def. Raether pleads NC to CDTP and Def. Panek pleads Guilty to Operate Firearm while intox.

15CT42 (Saxe): Court accepts plea and waiver, defers finding of guilt and approves DPA

15CT38 (Hunt): Court accepts plea and waiver, finds Def. guilty of OAR and sentences to $100 F+C = $379 and $200 DNA surcharge w/in 60 days

14CM588: Court accepts plea and waiver and finds Def. guilty of Operate while intox.; State heard; Court imposes sentence: $500 F+C and $200 DNA surcharge w/in 60 days

15CM30 (Raether): Court accepts plea and waiver and finds Def. guilty of CDTP; State heard; victim rights complied with; State notes restitution has been paid; Court imposes sentence: $100 F+C = $379 plus $200 DNA surcharge within 60 days

9:25 - Defendant, Daniel W Raether in court, Robert G. Barrington appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. P&S set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 9, 2015 at 11:15 am.
